customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: A light show and a speaker all in one
customer_reviews.text: I really love this speaker for what it is. First off, the sound quality is great for its size. It’s got good bass and doesn’t overpower the vocals. It sounds punchy and clear. It also gets really loud even under 50% volume. Battery life is pretty good. And the lights are what make it really cool in my opinion. It has 4 preset light effects and you can make your own effect via the JBL connect app. The only negative I found is that it’s a bit of a fingerprint magnet. Overall, I highly recommend this speaker to anyone who wants great sound quality as well as a light show to go with their music.

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to any previous JBL speaker models.
customer_reviews.text: A really cool speaker, if you’re buying your first JBL speaker that is. Sadly if you’ve have one of the previous JBL devices and you want to use them together you can’t. JBL has created a new multi device protocol for the Pulse 4 that literally makes it impossible to connect it with an of the previous JBL speakers... cool. Going to have to return and buying an older model of the pulse so I can pair it with my JBL boom box, which I only got last year. Just save your time and money if you have any of the connect or the connect+ models don’t buy the newer JBLs

Not sure if it’s on my end or the speakers end but overall great speaker and would recommend!
